name: Feishu Bitable
description: 飞书多维表格(Bitable)API技能 - 用于创建、读取、更新和删除飞书多维表格的数据表、记录和字段
changelog:
Initial release with complete Feishu Bitable API integration:
- Full table management (list, create, get, delete)
- Complete record operations (CRUD + batch)
- Field and view management
- Automatic token refresh
- Error handling and retry logic
- Command-line interface
- Examples and documentation
author: Clawdbot Community
